description: Try our easy to follow Peanut Butter & Choc Loaf recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Peanut Butter & Choc Loaf Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 chocolate waffle cones, crushed & 3 vanilla waffle cones

recipeInstructions.text: Stir chocolate and cream in a small saucepan over low heat until melted and combined. Cool for 10 minutes. Spoon sauce over ice-cream and serve.
